subtitle: a bibliography
title: American folklore
subjects: United States -- Social life and customs -- Bibliography
by_statement: compiled by Marguerite Cooley and Vernon Parks, 1952 ; revised by Juanita C. Jackson, 1954.
publishers: Dept. of English, George Peabody College for Teachers

notes.value:
"This bibliography of American folklore includes only books that are in the Joint University Library ... Peabody College Library ... and in the Peabody College Music Library"--Foreword.
